name: Street Food South East Asia
summary:
You inherited your fathers street food stall which has been apart of the family for generations and you will need to bring it back prosperity. Along your journey, you set out to expand your hawker stall empire, pick up gifts, serve up spicy dishes, earn a Michelin star, become a celebrity chef, don't make your customers sick and become the Street Food tycoon.
Street Food South East Asia brings back all the simple gameplay from the original but with new RPG gameplay elements.
